content: min� keychai� cthulh� dic� ba� tools 4mm hook yarn of any weight i recommend light worsted weight tapestry needle for weaving ends 2 safety eyes stitches required us terminology double_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet increase - double_crochet increase single_crochet - single_crochet blo single_crochet - back loops only single_crochet half_double_crochet - half-double_crochet skip st - skip stitch fpdc - front post double_crochet slip_stitch - slip st pattern work in a round using your base color yarn dominant color round 1 12 double_crochet in a magic_ring 12 sts round 2 double_crochet increase - 12 times 24 sts round 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet - 12 times 36 sts round 4 1 blo single_crochet in each of the next 36 sts 36 sts round 5 1 double_crochet in each of the next 36 sts 36 sts round 6 1 double_crochet in each of the next 8 sts let s make some tentacles now chain 10 make 4 double_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook make 3 double_crochet in the next chain make 3 double_crochet in the next chain make 2 half_double_crochet in the next chain make 2 half_double_crochet in the next chain make 1 half_double_crochet in the next chain make 1 single_crochet in the next chain make 1 single_crochet in the next chain 1 double_crochet in the next st of the round - 3 times it should look like 3 little tentacles in a row make 1dc in each of the next 25 sts 33 sts 3 tentacles round 7 1 double_crochet in each of the next 8 sts you will now be covering the small holes left by the 3 tentacle sts so reach down into round 5 and make 3 where your 3 double_crochet would have been if you did not add chains on them then make 1 double_crochet in each of the next 25 sts 36 sts round 8-9 1 double_crochet in each of the next 36 sts 36 sts i recommend adding the eyes now i like to add them in round 7 about 7 sts apart round 10 1 double_crochet ch1 skip a st - 18 times slip_stitch into the first ch1 space to make the round flat 18 sts this round you will weave your drawstring into round 11 ch1 this is not a st 1 single_crochet in the ch1 space 1 double_crochet in the double_crochet - 18 times 36 sts fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing some eyebrows on if you d like weave in all ends drawstring chain as many chains to make a string as a drawstring weave in the ends into the chain with my gauge i personally chain 65 weave this drawstring into your bag i also like to add a little keychain on the back for extra versatility any issues send me an email at maddylukkes@gmail com
